verses.name: Romans 10:9
verses.text: That if thou shalt confess with thy mouth the Lord Jesus, and shalt believe in thine heart that God hath raised him from the dead, thou shalt be saved.

verses.name: Romans 10:10
verses.text: For with the heart man believeth unto righteousness; and with the mouth confession is made unto salvation.

verses.name: Romans 10:11
verses.text: For the scripture saith, Whosoever believeth on him shall not be ashamed.

verses.name: Romans 10:12
verses.text: For there is no difference between the Jew and the Greek: for the same Lord over all is rich unto all that call upon him.

verses.name: Romans 10:13
verses.text: For whosoever shall call upon the name of the Lord shall be saved.
